original_text: And it came to pass, as he was worshipping in the house of Nisroch his god, that Adrammelech and Sharezer his sons smote him with the sword: and they escaped into the land of Armenia. And Esarhaddon his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 그가 그의 신 니스록의 신전에서 경배할 때에 아드람멜렉과 사레셀이 그를 칼로 쳐죽이고 아라랏 땅으로 그들이 도망하매 그 아들 에살핫돈이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: as he was worshipping in the house of Nisroch his god
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 니스록 자기 신의 집에서 경배할 때

sentences.original_text: that Adrammelech and Sharezer his sons smote him with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 아드람멜렉과 사레셀 그의 아들들이 칼로 그를 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: and they escaped into the land of Armenia
And Esarhaddon his son reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 에살하돈 그의 아들이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되었더라
